item.title: How to Place Buttons and Buttonholes on the Shirt Front
item.description: Ad: This tutorial is a complementary post for the Sienna: Button-Down Blouse pattern, which is now available for sale on Etsy. It is no secret that I tend to write long articles, and this one is no exception. It is lengthy, almost like a book chapter, but filled with detailed information. If you’re here for the first time, I recommend reading it all. However, if you’re returning to refresh your memory, feel free to skip to the section you need using the list below.
